INSTRUCTIONS: Replace this file with your Google Service Account credentials JSON
STEPS: 2. Create a new project or select an existing one
3. Enable the Google Drive API for your project
4. Go to IAM & Admin > Service Accounts
5. Create a new service account or select an existing one
6. Create a new key (JSON type) for the service account
7. Download the JSON file and replace this placeholder file
8. Make sure the service account has the necessary Drive permissions
